nodes.text: Ben Solo and the Bug Hunters – Chapter 2
"Ben Solo and the Bug Hunters – Chapter 2" is the fifteenth episode of the animated shorts series Star Wars Roll Out. It was first released March 25, 2020 on YouTube.
Han Solo and Chewbacca have been captured by the Bug Hunters, but Ben Solo just might be able to set them free–while wrecking the evil gang's plans!

Aboard the Millennium Falcon, Ben Solo manages to break free of his restraints by hurling a ball at one of the metal pipes. Solo hurls more balls at the pipes, releasing gas that causes the starship to shake. Ben manages to break free and roll out.

Meanwhile, Han Solo and Chewbacca are trapped in a net with several crystal butterflies. Several Bug Hunters laugh and gloat at them. Ben climbs a mountain and discovers the Bug Hunters' ship. He finds several crystal butterflies trapped in cages. The insects shake out glowing blue flakes into barrels, which the Bug Hunters collect as diamonds.

Ben frees the butterflies from their cages. One of the Bug Hunters discovers him. Ben manages to dodge him by climbing on top of the cages and freeing the butterflies. The Bug Hunter shoots at him but accidentally activates a hatch, causing the blue butterflies to fly out. The butterflies carry Ben into the sky. The alien pursues him in an airspeeder.

Meanwhile, Han and Ben are trapped in cages. Ben and the butterflies fly over these cages, wrecking havoc. Ben frees more of the butterflies as well as Han and Chewbacca. Ben, Han and Chewbacca escape in a speeder. The aliens pursue them in speeders but Solo and Han fire back. Ben flies the speeder downhill. He enjoys the ride but his father and Chewbacca find it too bumpy to their liking.
